title: Mapping
description: A mapping used by Glue to extract findings from a security tool report

task_name.description: The name of the task (tool) the produce those findings

app_name.description: Path to the property in the report file that contains the target app name

key.description: The key in the JSON report to an array that contains findings

properties.description: The mapping between the items in the array and Glue's findings

description.description: The path on the array item to extract the description

detail.description: The path on the array item to extract the details

source.description: The path on the array item to extract the source

severity.description: The path on the array item to extract the severity

fingerprint.description: The path on the array item to extract the fingerprint
